item.description:
When:
Tuesday, April 10, 2007, 7:00 PM
Where:
MIT Building E-51
70 Memorial Drive Cambridge, MA
Cambridge , MA 02138

Description:

Boston Investors Business Daily Tuesday Meetup

This meeting is primarily discussion and stock tips. This month we will also have a technical analysis presentation by Harlan Rieur. The informal format gives all members an opportunity to express and share ideas and opinions. All levels of expertise are welcome. No question is too simple - as a matter of fact the simplest question often evokes the best discussion!

Over time this agenda can change as new needs become apparent.

Directions:
Location: MIT Building E51. MIT, 77 Mass Ave, Cambridge, MA, USA.
(This building is on the far eastern side of the MIT
campus, about a ten minute walk from the main entrance,
and about two minutes from the Kendall Square 'T' stop.

This is a free meeting. There is no membership required.

When and Where:

Tuesday, April 10, 2007 at 7:00 PM
MIT E51, Boston , MA 02101
item.name: Boston IBD Tuesday Discussion Meetup
